scenario_text.value: Hmm? ...Wait, what?

This ain’t good, Takuma... The door to the
outside won’t open...
What?!

And the lock’s on this side. It feels like
something’s blocking it from the other side.

Hnnngh! Curses, even my strength is not
enough to budge it.

This means someone—or someTHING—has locked us
in here?
The monster that took Aoi, you think...?

Dammit, don’t think it’ll be that easy! We
won’t let you take us like you did Aoi!
Right you are. Let us proceed with care.

(Minoru and Falcomon are raring to go. Those
two’ll be just fine.)
Yeeep!
You okay, Minoru? Your face...
T-Takuma... B-behind you...
Huh? Behind me...?
What the—?!

(I thought I just saw a little kid by the
stairs...but now there’s nothing there.)
Oh jeez, oh man...

Chill out, Minoru. It’s gone now, whatever
it was.

You, you don’t think it was the g-g-g...
...The ost-ghay?
Not sure. Should we check it out?

It went up to the <color=#B41919>second floor</color>. C’mon,
Agumon!
Yeah!
